title: Vertical Spacing Failure
description: Vertical spacing utilities (space-y-*) are missing or fail to apply margin-top rules to child elements, causing content to collapse together.

title: feat: news site template
description: Create a modern news site template and add it to the scaffold command.

title: Non-Existent Link Styling
description: Anchor tags have no default styling or clear utility classes in the Starlight theme. Links blend in with text or look broken. Expected theme-aware states (hover, active, visited) matching neon/glassmorphism vibe.

title: Accessibility (a11y) Focus
description: Implement High Contrast mode and ensure all neon/gradient combinations pass WCAG color contrast standards.

title: Cosmic Animation Library
description: Add a dedicated quantum-animations.css file for advanced Starlight effects like parallax nebula drifts and complex SVG path animations.

title: Broken Badge Components
description: The .badge and associated classes (e.g., .badge-primary, .badge-secondary) fail to render correctly. They appear as unstyled spans or lack padding, border-radius, and background opacity adjustments.

title: Dynamic Documentation
description: Create a 'Kitchen Sink' page that dynamically lists all generated utilities and custom design tokens for better developer visibility.

title: Component Presets
description: Allow users to define custom component presets in quantum.config.json that the JIT engine can then generate automatically.

title: Generator / JIT Inconsistency
description: Standard responsive grid utilities (e.g., lg:grid-cols-12) were not generated by the CLI, requiring manual CSS fixes.

title: Advanced CLI Scaffolding
description: Expand the quantumcss CLI with a 'scaffold' command to quickly generate pre-styled template files (e.g., gaming, blog, travel).

title: Broken Layering and Z-Index
description: Generator fails to output z-index utility classes (e.g., .z-50). .starlight-card has hardcoded z-index: 1, while sticky nav remains at base level, getting swallowed during scroll.
